ygData.subject: Weird behavior with job folder
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I m using the Heritrix 3.1 REST API to create/launch/etc. jobs via a http client. Recently I ran into a rather weird behavior : all my submited jobs appear

Hi,

I'm using the Heritrix 3.1 REST API to create/launch/etc. jobs via a h=
ttp client.
Recently I ran into a rather weird behavior : all my submited j=
obs appear in the heritrix "jobs" folder as plain xml files (one xml file p=
er job):
* job1-beans.xml
* job2-beans.xml
...

instead of folders (one fol=
der per job) :
* job1
* job2
* etc.

I'm curious if anyone ran into this ki=
nd of issue before and if you guys have any suggestions on how to solve thi=
s issue.

Regards
Paul.
